about.bio: I build intelligent, real-world AI-driven solutions that address meaningful problems. Passionate about AI/ML, scalable systems, and community-driven innovation, with hands-on experience across AI, full-stack development, and problem-solving.
focus: Developing scalable web and backend systems

experience.title: AI Engineer Intern
experience.description: Just started my internship at GlideCloud Solution, where I'm diving into AI engineering projects. I'm excited to apply my skills and learn from real-world applications in the AI domain.
achievements: Working on developing AI models to enhance cloud solutions
Diving into Agentic AI and its applications

experience.title: Web Dev Secretary
experience.description: Through Computer Society of India, I've had the opportunity to collaborate with some really skilled and ambitious teams. From creating the official website, to hosting flagship events, I've gained a lot of exposure through this experience.
achievements: Hosted Git & Github workshop for new recruits
Hosting and curation of CodeFlix 2025 - a flagship event containing a tech talk, Codezilla - tech hackathon and BugFather - a bug bounty
Led a team of coordinators to create a website for an old age home.

experience.title: Academic Support Volunteer
experience.description: For a year, I had the distinct privilege of volunteering with Make A Difference as an Academic Support Volunteer (ASV). It was an opportunity that ignited a spark within me, allowing me to utilize my skills in a way that directly impacted the lives of children.
achievements: Got to know their way of life and challenges
Helped improve their academic performance and confidence

experience.title: Web Dev Intern
experience.description: Had an on-site internship experience at the Technobase IT Solutions Pvt. Ltd. The focus was to hone my programming and web development skills.
achievements: Got to know the foundations of web development in a corporate environment
Improved my teamwork and communication skills
Designed a user management system for the company using PHP and MySQL

education.degree: BTech - Artificial Intelligence and Data Science

education.institution: Somalwar High School and Junior College, Nikalas Branch, Nagpur

awards.title: Winner - TE AI Cup 2025
awards.description: An exciting 6 month International Hackathon, which consisted of 24 universities around the globe, 8 countries from various parts of Europe, Asia and America. My team stood 3rd globally and 1st in India, making us the only Indian team to make it to the top 3.

awards.title: Star of Nikalas
awards.description: Winner of Star of Nikalas - The most prestigious award of our school, given to 10-15 students from all the sections in 10th grade who perform exceptionally well throughout their schooling.
